mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_message (sender_id, receiver_id, content, is_read, product_id) VALUES (#{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, FALSE, #{productId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM chat_message WHERE (sender_id = #{param1} AND receiver_id = #{param2}) OR (sender_id = #{param2} AND receiver_id = #{param1}) ORDER BY sent_at ASC

WITH conversations AS ( SELECT CASE WHEN sender_id = #{userId} THEN receiver_id ELSE sender_id END AS partnerId, p.product_id as productId, p.product_name as productName, c.is_read, c.receiver_id, c.sent_at FROM chat_message c LEFT JOIN product p ON c.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.sender_id = #{userId} OR c.receiver_id = #{userId} ) SELECT partnerId, productId, productName, (MAX(CASE WHEN receiver_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)) > 0 AS hasUnread FROM conversations GROUP BY partnerId, productId, productName ORDER BY MAX(sent_at) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE chat_message SET is_read = TRUE WHERE receiver_id = #{param1} AND sender_id = #{param2} AND is_read = FALSE
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chat_message WHERE receiver_id = #{userId} AND is_read = FALSE
